fields.introduction: David Oliver Tate believes the saying 'life is like a box of chocolates you never know what you're gonna get' is a phrase for elitist snobs. Who can afford those fancy-ass chocolates boxes where each and every flavor is different? David can't. The phrase would better be, 'Life is like a box of chocolates. You know exactly what you're going to get because it's always the same cheap shit that's never very great. Unless you're super rich. Sheesh, I'm sounding like a whiner. And worse, a communist.
David Oliver Tate is not a communist. No, anyone who says they're not a communist is always a communist. Lightbulb moment.
David Oliver Tate is a communist.
David Oliver Tate is not a communist though he deems elements of communism beneficial to society. Now, all the communists and capitalists won't read my book.

Your author decided not to include an About the Author. There are no more bios after this. If you go back in time via clicking the button, your page will not refresh. You will not pass go. You will not collect $200. These words will stare you down for eternity. Hope you enjoy this book club or class or whatever godforsaken group of individuals is using this website.
